body:
Stats being recorded on scrim servers, is it intentional or a glitch?
How about Map Dev overriding Mod, is that intentional too?
Just a few questions :)
body_tagged:

title: Stuff

replies.body: Stats showing on scrim servers I don't believe is intentional but I know that MapDev overriding mod is intentional
replies.body_tagged: Stats showing on scrim servers I don't believe is intentional but I know that MapDev overriding mod is intentional

replies.body: What's the reason behind Map Dev overriding Mod?
replies.body_tagged: What's the reason behind Map Dev overriding Mod?

reply_to.body: Stats showing on scrim servers I don't believe is intentional but I know that MapDev overriding mod is intentional
reply_to.body_tagged: Stats showing on scrim servers I don't believe is intentional but I know that MapDev overriding mod is intentional

replies.body: Maybe because before if you were trying to find a map dev is was pretty difficult, if you're not sure if someone is map dev then you would have to look it up on the forums. For the people that don't use or don't know about the forums, then well, finding out if someone is map dev would be difficult.

replies.body:
A few things on the forums I've noticed-

-really long post cooldown 
-not being able to use search tab
-can't see my own discussions
-when a post I make is archived I can no longer view it, even though it was intentionally deleted by me
-ddos protect popping up when I make a post, then crashing my browser
-alerts lagging my browser when I try to clear them
-forum ranks (ex jr mod) appear on profiles but not on forum
-not being able to view pages higher than two
-past reports and appeals dont show up
